외과 수술기록(갑상선)
[입원] 등록번호:10172791
환자명: 윤희정(F/55) 생년월일: 1970-03-24 진료과 : 외과
진료일: 2025-08-11
Incision length: 9 cm
Bleeding minimal cc
수술방법 및 절차
1. Under the general endotracheal anesthesia, the patient was placed at the surgical
table by supine position with hyperextended neck.
2. The operative field was prepared and drapped as usual sterile manner.
3. Low transverse curvilinear skin incision was made along the natural skin crease.
If neck node dissection: Rt.
The flap was elevated upto the hyoid bone and inferiorly down to clavicle and
manubrium. Posteriorly to trapezius muscle, the flap was developed. The lateral neck
lymph node was dissected.
The thyroidal gland was mobilized from the trachea. The medial portion of the thyroid
gland was clmped with mosquitos and the ipsilateral lobe was pused toward medially.
5. Superior thyroidal vessels were divided and ligated individually.
6. The thyroid gland was mobilized from the trachea. Inferior thyroid vessels were
divided and ligated with identification and preservation of recurrent laryngeal nerve.
The exposed tracheo-esophageal groove area was dissected with caution not to
injure recurrent laryngeal nerve. Pretracheal portion of thyroid gland was dissected
shaved out from the tracheal carilage. After delivery of the specimen, bleeders were
controlled.
7. The dead space was irrigated with saline and minor bleeders were controlled.
8. The ribbon muscle was repaired with 3-0 vicryl interruptedly.
10. The platysma muscle and subcutaneous tissue were approximated with 3-0
vicryl interruptedly.
11. The skin was approximated by subcuticular continuous suture.
12. Aseptic dressing was applied on the operative wound.
Other procedure
National Health
